message: I'm being generous, but I'm confident I can get a better deal in the future if you refuse.
Let's be fair.  I'm willing to split the money 60/40 in our favor, which is still more than you offered me last round. Accept, and we both get something, or risk losing more with each passing round.
My offer is still generous, considering you lost 10% of your value from last round.  Accept this and we both get something, or risk losing more with each passing round.
Let's split it down the middle this time.  We've both lost value due to inflation, so it's time to compromise. Accept, and we both get a fair share.  Reject, and we risk getting nothing at all.
